text: Koloe () was a town of ancient Lydia, inhabited during Roman and Byzantine times. Its site is located near Kiraz in Asiatic Turkey. ==References== Category:Populated places in ancient Lydia Category:Former populated places in Turkey Category:Roman towns and cities in Turkey Category:Populated places of the Byzantine Empire Category:History of İzmir Province Category:Kiraz District
title: Koloe (Lydia)
